CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.Name: Cosmere_Metal_Gold
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.label: Gold
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.description: Gold is a dense, soft, and radiant metal long valued for its rarity and beauty. Resistant to tarnish and corrosion, it has held significance in both trade and symbolism throughout history.
